name: Carnophobia
description:
Carnophobia is a short 3D horror experience. Inspired by Alien Isolation, the player must navigate through a abandoned space port to find a way out. Explore the station, keep your eyes peeled for the meatman. Can you escape before the terror catches you. The game was made in Unreal Engine 4. Primary mechanics used are from Horror Engine. Enjoy.

Controls:

SHIFT - sprint

CTRL - crouch

Q & E - Lean left and right

F - flashlight (limited battery life)

LEFT MOUSE - interact with buttons, documents, and other interactables.

I - inventory

ESC - Pause game or exit out.
